# Assignment 1


::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_387ec238ee23f9246ca1057a18bbae54'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggdag)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'ggdag'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> The following object is masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
dag<-dagify(used_ftr ~ time_spent + rand_enc, time_spent ~ used_ftr, exposure = "used_ftr", outcome = "time_spent")

ggdag(dag)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](09_iv_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Assignment 2


::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_1436fd4131dd496697b32b4e5139fad2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
data<-readRDS("C:/Users/Marcel/Master/DataScience/data/rand_enc.rds")

model_naive <- lm(time_spent ~ used_ftr, data = data)
summary(model_naive)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = time_spent ~ used_ftr, data = data)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>      Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
#> -20.4950  -3.5393   0.0158   3.5961  20.5051 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept) 18.86993    0.06955   271.3   <2e-16 ***
#> used_ftr    10.82269    0.10888    99.4   <2e-16 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 5.351 on 9998 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.497,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.497 
#> F-statistic:  9881 on 1 and 9998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::


# Assignment 3


::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_59a8f8c3c6f1640f12f45369c8369739'}

```{.r .cell-code}
cor(data) %>% round(2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#>            rand_enc used_ftr time_spent
#> rand_enc       1.00     0.20       0.13
#> used_ftr       0.20     1.00       0.71
#> time_spent     0.13     0.71       1.00
```
:::
:::


# Assignment 4


::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_02fcd3ce18e3cc62d3f8780714bfc454'}

```{.r .cell-code}
#first_stage <- lm(used_ftr ~ rand_enc, data = data)
#summary(first_stage)

#second_stage <- lm(data$time_spent ~ first_stage$fitted.values)
#summary(second_stage)

library(estimatr)
model_iv <- iv_robust(time_spent ~ used_ftr | rand_enc, data = data)
summary(model_iv)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> iv_robust(formula = time_spent ~ used_ftr | rand_enc, data = data)
#> 
#> Standard error type:  HC2 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value  Pr(>|t|) CI Lower CI Upper   DF
#> (Intercept)   19.312     0.2248   85.89 0.000e+00   18.872    19.75 9998
#> used_ftr       9.738     0.5353   18.19 8.716e-73    8.689    10.79 9998
#> 
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.4921 ,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.492 
#> F-statistic:   331 on 1 and 9998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::


The naive estimate has a value of 10.822 while the IV estimate is 9.738. As the naive estimate is higher than the IV estimate i would consider it slightly upward biased.
